title: Son of Don
description: Everyone knows and respects his father. He’s called The Don. Tony is just a kid, but must determine his place within his family and with the neighborhood.
quote: You gotta stay tough to be tough, son.
altHero: Tony, a young Italian boy, with his father whispering in his ear
alt1: Tony with his friends at a restaurant
alt4: a man tied up in the restaurant kitchen
